topic.title: KopyKate v1.3.1 BETA (YouTube/Netflix alternative for ZeroNet) - UPDATE!
topic.body:
**KopyKate v1.3.1 BETA - UPDATE**
 
ZeroNet link: http://127.0.0.1:43110/kopykate.bit/
For viewing outside of ZeroNet: http://kopykate.ga/
**New features:**
- Enhanced mobile page view (mobile only works on android!)
- All the newest major 2016 DVD releases uploaded
- Improved uploader + Video tutorials!
- Improved video player layout

topic.title: KopyKate BIG - Video Sharing with Big Files, the YouTube of Everything
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit
KopyKate BIG - Video Sharing with Big Files, the YouTube of Everything

KopyKate launches its big file experiment. Built upon the ZeroUp code, it features a search engine, video player, editable content and more coming soon!

Unlike ZeroUp, this is for videos only. Up to 2gb allowed. Will be clonable and fully functional by Christmas, and will include documentation.

topic.title: KopyKate BIG 1.1 ALPHA - Video Sharing Platform for ZeroNet
www.zerocat.eu zerocat.eu - ZeroNet proxy with 900GB storage
topic.body:
https://www.zerocat.eu - ZeroNet proxy with 900GB storage
 
Hosted on a quality seedbox provider, which charges more than a standard VPS. Uses Coinhive miner running at 10% speed in order to pay the bills, so please click allow and/or disable adblockers on the site if you wish to access the content. If it grows in popularity, then part of the revenue will also be used to donate to ZeroNet creators, as well as other free open source projects.
 
Benefits of using ZeroNet proxies:

- Get instant peers for your new site
- View your site from the perspective of other users, debugging
- Boost availability of your big files until they get enough seeders
- Use ZeroNet without installing ZeroNet, if storage is limited or ZeroNet client cannot be installed, etc.
- Raise awareness of ZeroNet to outsiders

Happy proxying!

45_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body:
It's basically a copy of http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit, but with the YouTube logo.
Kopykate BIG was copied from ZeroUp, but I created the search functionality, user video list and video player. (Wasn't meant to compete with ZeroUp, anyway.. as ZeroUp is for sharing files, Kopykate is for video.)
